title: Can I turn an autobiography into a self-help book? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well does your biography well does your biography include our transformation through self-help that change your life for the better if that's the case you could possibly do it other than that I don't know I don't know your life achievements but if you have enough of them when you present them in the right way you could probably create some type of self-help book doesn't hurt to try that's one thing about writing doesn't pay you don't have to pay to enjoy. Thank you hope that helps
